content: weave in all ends lightly block as needed enjoy 3 e g a p abbreviations bobble= bind off co= cast on k = knit mm= millimeter m= marker repeat= repeat rs= right side st= stitch st st =stockinette st ws= wrong side this pattern is copyright 2020 please do not copy reproduce or distribute this pattern without written permission http //capemayfiber com vanessaewingdesign@gmail com
